description: A React functional component called Pagination that renders a pagination control with 'Prev' and 'Next' buttons and displays the current page number out of total pages.

methods.name: Pagination({ page, pages, onPage })
methods.description: React functional component rendering pagination controls with page navigation logic.

ctags.name: Pagination
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Pagination({ page, pages, onPage }) {$/
